html:
1.5.19  10:05 pm   What is your opinion on the inverted question mark (¿)?

     fun for the whole family

1.5.19  10:02 pm   what are your thoughts on colors?

     i don't really understand them

1.5.19  10:00 pm   Why evil people lives in skull-shaped lairs?

     they are very comfortable

1.5.19  9:17 pm   Yo, what scale is "and the days goes on" in? 

     it's in the key of F#

1.5.19  8:59 pm   Where's the new album?

     i'm doing songs individually, which is much more fun for me

1.5.19  8:45 pm   Are you drunk when you make your videos

     no but perhaps that would hlep

1.5.19  7:52 pm   why do americans accentuate their Rs?

     i think it was actually London who tried to stop doing it, for fashion purposes

1.5.19  7:08 pm   Do you have any tips for transcribing tunes? I've never done it before and it is a bit daunting.

     starty by just doing the melody, or just the chords, etc. or maybe even just the lyrics

1.5.19  6:45 pm   Watch out, a huge dragon is blocking you and you need do knock it out to pass. What will you do?

     knock it out i guess

1.5.19  6:03 pm   how do you tell between thoughts and reality?

     thoughts can change slightly faster

1.5.19  5:48 pm   Do you believe in innate talent?

     i'm not sure what that means

      If so, how important do you think it is? For example, could a person with what seems like little talent rise to the same level of virtuosity as someone who was seemingly born talented?

     it seems you wouldn't know if they are talented until they started doing things ....

      This applies to all creative activities, be it music or cooking or whatever else.

1.5.19  5:19 pm   how does the modulation in slowdown from the verse to the chorus work?

     the key goes up a half step, even though you never hit the 1 chord of the new key. the main key is F, and the chorus (actually i call it the bridge) starts on Abmin, as if that's the new 2 chord (of Gb). so the new key is Gb but you never hit the 1 chord

1.5.19  5:13 pm   can you talk about a detail in one of your vids that you think nobody's caught yet, or at least mentioned?

     there is a hidden thing in history of the entire world i guess that i've never heard of anyone finding, and i am surprised. i'm sure people have found it but i've never heard of anyone finding it. i can't say what it is because then i will never find out if anyone found it

1.5.19  5:03 pm   do you usually start with a single melody?

     sure but i usually know what the lyric for it is, and the chords usually come with it too

1.5.19  4:31 pm   does one have to be a good musician to write a good song

     writing a good song counts as being a good musician, even if you are 'not' a 'good musician' in any 'other way'

1.5.19  4:18 pm   how did you feel on the h3podcast?

     it felt kind of like walking a tightrope in between a tightrope and a tightrope

1.5.19  4:13 pm   how should I escape a cult

     you must start your own cult within the cult and invite everyone in the cult

1.5.19  4:08 pm   Do you make a conscious effort to switch musical styles and/or practice new elements of music in each new video?

     yes

      I feel like each video kinda has its own musical style. Variations on a melody, experimental chord progressions, focus on percussion, etc.

1.5.19  4:03 pm   Are you still on your die-trying song per week schedule?

     yes, it's actually 1 every 2 weeks, but i'll tell you right now i'm in serious serious serious serious serious serious serious serious trouble

1.5.19  3:31 pm   what should i caption my next instagram post?

     My New Post

1.5.19  3:19 pm   why did u get into music and not something cooler like using rich people's money to make them more money

     when i first got into music i was probably much too young to do finance. and by the time i was old enough i had already been doing music for so long that i had a huge advantage there already. actually i went to audition for a job doing data entry or spreadsheets or something, for a guy that did wealth management. and i screwed the whole thing up. luckily he had saved a backup copy in case i was gonna screw it up, which i did. so he politely said goodbye and thanks for wasting my time, etc

1.5.19  2:30 pm   what exactly do you do?

     i'm trying to figure it out

1.5.19  2:27 pm   is "its gonna be alright" a reggae song? 

     maybe

1.5.19  1:56 pm   what's the one song you really enjoyed making?

     i have enjoyed making many more than 1

1.5.19  1:20 pm   I am never serious about anything i am always making jokes about everything and never concentrate on anything i am finely intelligent but never get great marks any advice on being serious in life?

     it sounds like you are serious in life, but not terribly serious toward whoever is giving you the marks

1.5.19  12:40 pm   what's the difference between A6 and A13?

     A13 has G in it. it's just a weird quirk of society, that A13 means A7 with 13, and A7 is short for A dominant 7, which means it has b7 in it. A6 is not a dominant 7 chord. and don't ask me what dominant means, it just means it includes b7. it is not dominating anything in any way. except actually it probably dominated the blues scene so hard that it was the only chord anyone ever used so they stopped saying dominant and A7 became the default shorthand for A dominant 7

1.5.19  12:18 pm   what kind of music do you like the most?

     surprise me

1.5.19  10:33 am   I have duties but I'm too lazy to do them, even though it's of utmost importance that I do them. How do I find the motivation to get it over with?

     is there any consequence of not doing it? if not then don't do it. if so, then if you do it then you will avoid those consequences (good)

1.5.19  8:48 am   Dear Mr Wurtz, do you believe collaboration can allow you and your collaborator to create something extra special or just cause frustration and intense hatred for the other guy due to creative differences?

     surely both

1.5.19  8:04 am   How do you feel motivated to do the stuff that you do?

     want to

1.5.19  6:20 am   how do I not be in a box as a musician?

     try doing some non-musical things

1.5.19  5:23 am   how do i learn to speak french?

     probably go to france, for a long period of time. be born there if possible

1.5.19  4:09 am   When did you start playing the guitar ?

     not yet

      Do you have any advice for me, I have been teaching myself, its been over a month or so.

     get some song books?

1.5.19  2:50 am   are you going anywhere with what you do?

     i am already somewhere but i am still going there

1.5.19  2:44 am   Did the colour orange get named after the fruit or was the fruit named after the colour

     the fruit was named first

1.5.19  2:20 am   If you can remember, what did you dream about in your last dream

     i went to some kind of deli counter and asked if they have a jar of peanut butter, and she said yes, that will be 2.34 (or something) and she charged me without really checking to see if they had it. and then it turned out that they kind of had half a jar, and maybe another weird kind

1.5.19  1:26 am   do you consider yourself a poet?

     everyone is poets

1.5.19  1:19 am   How do you feel while making songs

     bad and good

1.5.19  12:41 am   Hey so you've inspired me a lot lately and that's led to me trying to make my first song with lyrics, but I'm not very confident with my singing voice. Any advice for improving the tone and such of one's voice? 

     just continue using your voice throughout each day, in a way that is fun and enjoyable

1.5.19  12:33 am   "Mostly violence"
If it's only mostly violence, what is the rest of it?

     unspecified

1.4.19  11:14 pm   How do you feel about being a potential influence for a new generation of musicians/artists when you yourself are still going through the process of learning/improving?

     very good

1.4.19  10:05 pm   u tend to like that weird III III6 vi thing in the context of a major key, is it a lil earworm that u throw in as a filler chord, or is it just a lil earworm u like to hear

     you might be using the notation differently than me, but what you wrote looks like something i've never heard or done

1.4.19  10:02 pm   how do you come up with melodies?

     you have to let them come up with you

      do you sit there and think about them for a long time or do they just happen?

     both

1.4.19  8:59 pm   What is the ideal food to eat with a spork? 

     mush

1.4.19  8:29 pm   what if they renamed the word sandwich to breadwich

     who

1.4.19  8:03 pm   If you go into expert mode and scroll down to the bottom, what was going on with all those pictures? Some of them are genuine photography, while others are completely random like a picture of a triangle. Pls explain??

      that moment when you just want to make elaborate audio/visual content but it's probably so damn complicated to do it the way you want and would take still many more years of experience to get all the right skills and procedures together, so you get restless and take a walk with a camera to try to maybe cope with the insatiable longing feelings

1.4.19  6:38 pm   When I draw, I feel like I'm where I belong, as if I have finally returned home after a long, long time away. Does making your music cause you to feel the same?

     it feels that way when i really get it right

1.4.19  6:22 pm   are you the original shitposter

     no you're thinking of socretes

1.4.19  5:54 pm   Hi! How can I get better at piano? Specifically, how do I get better at using both hands?

     you could get a sock, poke a hole in the sock, and then wear that around whichever hand is currently better at piano. and then only put 1 finger through the sock. and let your less experienced hand use all 5 fingers. and then just start playing

1.4.19  5:22 pm   would you describe yourself as decisive

     yes and no
